column4: the apps you run will spawn new processes and display on the client only, so no.Why do you want to access the remote desktop?
To show my friend how to effectively use some linux stuff whilst talking over skype
ahhh, a good use of VNC, you can use VNC via SSH tunnel for security
Ah, okay, it's just I heard X11 forwarding uses less bandwidth, and I'd never used it before so I was curious :P
